page.description: Displays a dialog to create and edit saved ADO or AlphaDAO connection string definitions.

argument.name: library
argument.description: Set to blank ("") to open connection strings in the current workspace. The workspace library to open the connection strings dialog.

argument.name: conn_mode
argument.description: The connection mode. Set to "cs" to show AlphaDAO connections and edit existing connections. If blank,the ADO connections dialog is shown.

page.discussion: Shows connection strings in the current workspace. Pass "cs" as the second parameter to display and edit saved AlphaDAO connections. If the second parameter is left blank, the ADO connection strings dialog is shown.

example.caption: Open the AlphaDAO Connection String dialog for the current workspace.
